answers.answer: you need to get an pimay care Dr. and start addressing the situation asap before you get more complications.  Your primary care Dr. will get you going in the right direction.

question: Please advice if my wife aged 47 years also suffering from any other desease other than diabetes. she is not taking any medicine for diabetes. she has lost weight 13 kg in last 5 months. she was detected diabetes 5 months ago only. before that we have got no tests. please advice me what should i do? is there anything to worry about?In her report following values are beyond limitsPlasma Glucose Fasting.is 160.84Plasma Glucose PP.	240.06B. Glycosylated Hb (Hb A1c) 9.50E.S.R. (Westregen's)	49Lymphocytes 44.8S. Chloride. (ISE)	97.90
title: Diabetes with raised ESR and LYMPHOCYTES
